LightningComponentBundle.description: Allows users to query Salesforce data using natural language, which is automatically converted to SOQL

property.name: objectApiNames
property.label: Object API Names (comma-separated)
property.description: Enter the API names of the Salesforce objects to query, separated by commas (e.g., Account,Contact,Opportunity). The AI will try to use these objects based on your query.

property.name: llmConfigName
property.label: LLM Configuration Name
property.description: The Developer Name of the active LLM_Configuration__mdt record to use for generating SOQL.

property.name: primaryColor
property.label: Primary Color
property.description: Primary color for the component theme

property.name: accentColor
property.label: Accent Color
property.description: Accent color for the component theme

property.name: recordLimit
property.label: Record Limit
property.description: Maximum number of records to return

property.name: enableQueryHistory
property.label: Enable Query History
property.description: Save recent queries in browser storage
